text: The quick brown fox jumps over the lazy dog.
Success is not final, failure is not fatal.
Practice makes perfect, perfect practice makes permanent.
Be the change you wish to see in the world.
Every moment is a fresh beginning in life.
Where there's a will, there's always a way forward.
Knowledge speaks, but wisdom listens patiently.
Your future is created by what you do today.
Quality is not an act, it is a consistent habit.
The journey of a thousand miles begins with one step.
